title: Portrait of a Woman
marks: Signature and Date Signed, dated URQ, above woman\'s PL shoulder, in b
description: 3/4 length view of a standing woman wearing a large lozenge-shaped black hat, black cloak, and black dress with wide ruffled stand-up collar; lines of woman\'s garment drawn in V\'s
creditline: Gift of funds from the Ronald F. Kinney Foundation
